title: Traditional Cherry in Natural Finish | Abbey Caskets
description: Handcrafted by Abbey Caskets in St. Meinrad, Indiana. This traditional wooden casket is made of cherry wood with a natural finish and includes a wooden keepsake cross.
cleaned_text: Traditional Cherry in Natural Finish $3,675.00 Excludes Tax The Traditional Cherry Abbey Casket is built of black cherry hardwood. Black cherry wood is a rich reddish-brown color and is a strong, hard and close-grained wood. The natural finish of this casket shows the variety of color and grain patterns in the cherry wood. The Traditional Abbey Casket is fully lined in off-white linen. A solid wood swing bar handle is secured with Venetian bronze hardware on all four sides for ease of carrying. Delivery: Shipping & handling by common carrier is included with price of casket. Call for expedited, weekend or holiday delivery charges. Delivery is available 7 days a week.
